item.description:
Join Exemplar Entrepreneurs for a presentation on Legal Issues for Start-Ups and Small Businesses. Learn from talented business attorneys consulting on basic considerations that all business need to consider, such as:

-- Choice of Legal Entity
C-Corp
S-Corp
Partnerships
LLC's

-- Contracts (A Practical Guide to Contracts for your Business)
Common Mistakes
Contract Types and Things to Look Out for

-- Intellectual Property Basics (Practical Considerations)
Trademarks
Patents
Copyrights
Trade Secrets

Q&A


And Much More. Get personal attention and engage the panel with Questions and Answers on the things you want to know! Space is limited to ensure that everyone gets value, so seats will be available on a first-come, first-seved basis.

Presenters:

Fred Wilcon, Esq (Choice of Entity, Governance Basics)

Christopher Marson, Esq. (Intellecutal Property, Raising Capital - Basics)

Jessica Manganello, Esq. (Contracts, Alliances)

OF: Exemplar Law Partners, LLC Web: www.exemplarlaw.com
item.name: Seminar: Legal Issues for Start-Ups and Small Businesses
